## What is Tidy Tuesday?

A weekly data visualization project put on by some folks from the R Data Science community.


- [Tidy Tuesday Repository](https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday)

- [#TidyTuesday on Twitter](https://twitter.com/search?q=%23TidyTuesday&src=typeahead_click)
